WO-SPEC-SCENARIO-CORE.title: Phase 34: Scenario Framework Core API/DTO Spec
WO-SPEC-SCENARIO-CORE.instruction_raw: Design the core API and DTOs for the Unified Scenario Framework. Follow the Architect Prime verdict: Type-safe Builder pattern, BaseJudge abstract class, and 5 categories (M/S/T/C/P). Define ScenarioOutcome DTOs and IScenarioBuilder protocols. Ensure Zero-Sum Integrity (Tier 1) is hardcoded as a mandatory check.
